column17:
Product Description

Dreamon Professional Nutritive Hair Mask is formulated with intensive conditioning agents and naturals like jojoba & sweet almonds oil. It moisturizes the hair & scalps and helps to prevent from dryness & formation of the split ends. It assures you a healthy hair growth and bring beautiful & shiny hair.
